description.raw: Wrote ERB to generate 6 ladders, since the document specifies the teams can choose between ladders with 0, 1, or 2 handrails, with an incline of 60 or 75 degrees. I updated Task 3 to have all 6 ladders, which does look different from the document but I wanted the users to be able to choose the number of handrails. The handrails could maybe use a bit of tweaking or actual meshes instead of primitive shapes hacked together with trig, as they are in this branch, but I think this is a good start.

The handrails could maybe use a bit of tweaking or actual meshes instead of primitive shapes hacked together with trig, as they are in this branch, but I think this is a good start.
